title: Did the Beatles song Helter Skelter really cause Charles Manson to go on a murder rampage? - Quora

response.answer_text: Charles Manson was never into the Beatles or the lyrics of their songs. He didn’t even like their music that much. He considered it bubble gum music written for little girls. Now what’s interesting is the other Charles (Charles Watson) who actually stabbed all of those people to death that weekend absolutely idolized the Beatles he listened to them constantly. The first thing he requested his parents bring to him when they came to see him in the prison was his Beatles music. It seems that for some reason the prosecutor decided to confuse the facts when it came to the two Charles’.
No, his own delusions and the willingness of his followers to go along with him caused that.
